snippets.snippetDescription: Converts a selected text to a bullet list
snippets.name: Convert text to bullet list
Email Template
snippets.template:
Dear {@text|Name@},

Please remember to send us the remaining documents
before {@date|Deadline|dd.MM.yyyy@}.

Best regards,
Snippety

snippets.snippetDescription: Sample mail template with a subject and body. You may need to adjust the number of TABs for the client you use.
snippets.name: Email Template with Subject
snippets.template:
Friendly Reminder
{@key|⇥|0.2|1@}

Dear {@text|Name@},

Please remember to send us the remaining documents.

Best regards,
Snippety

snippets.snippetDescription: Uses AI Assistant to fix punctuation in the selected text
snippets.name: Fix punctuation
Generate Random Name
snippets.template: {@ai|None|Generate random English name. Answer only with first name and last name separated with space.@}

snippets.snippetDescription: Example of a snippet downloading code from GitHub
snippets.name: GitHub Snippet

snippets.snippetDescription: Example of a snippet downloading code from GitHub
snippets.name: Jira Issue Markdown Link

snippets.snippetDescription: Snippety allows you to create and preview Markdown
snippets.name: Markdown Example
snippets.template:
This is a sample **markdown** based on [GitHub Flavored Markdown Spec](https://github.github.com/gfm/).  
> Some features, like displaying tables or multi-image paragraphs, require macOS 13.0+

| First Header     | Second Header |
| -------------    | ------------- |
| Text Variable    | {@text|text@} |
| Calculated Date  | {@calculated-date|2m|dd.MM.yyyy|English@} |
| Selectable Value | {@selectable|Font|Light;Regular;Bold@} |

## Blocks
```
| First Header  | Second Header |
| ------------- | ------------- |
| Content Cell  | Content Cell  |
| Content Cell  | Content Cell  |
```

## Quotes
> If you want something done right, do it yourself.  
> *Charles-Guillaume Étienne*

## Lists
- First
- Second
- Third

1. John Snow
1. Jack Sparrow
1. Bilbo Baggins

- [x] Markdown rendering and styling
- [ ] Documentation and examples
- [ ] New release

## Images
![](https://picsum.photos/id/237/300/100)
![](https://picsum.photos/id/433/300/100)

snippets.snippetDescription: Creates a new class using the selected text for the class name
snippets.name: New Class
PR Review Request
snippets.template: @here PR for [{@text|Jira Issue ID|EMR-@}]({@text|Jira Issue URL@}): {@text|GitHub PR URL@}

snippets.snippetDescription: Removes empty lines from the selected text
snippets.name: Remove Empty Lines

snippets.name: Schema Migrations
snippets.template:
select * from schema_migrations sm order by sm.version desc
;

snippets.name: Table Info
snippets.template:
select * from information_schema.columns
where table_schema = 'public'
	and table_name = '{@text|table_name@}'
;
